ovdesc.p: This table is used to define different date tokens to be used for posting entries in the payments hub. The store table is referred for assigning token values to BookingDate,ValueDateToken and StatementTextToken.

desc.p: Indicates the company ID for which the record is created.
The value links to the field ‘CompanyID’ in PPT.COMPANY
Specifies the list of Date tokens that can be used in the date token column in posting lines table and also in the statement lines table.
Unique ID generated by the payments hub in order to identify each record in the application.
Concatenation of Primary Key Fields (CompanyID, DateToken).
Record Activation Code generated for the record by the payment's hub.
The value is not editable by the user.

The value is not editable by the user.
